name: Angel in Danger 3D
description:
"Angel In Danger 3D is one of the better ways to scratch your 3D platformer itch"
Touch Arcade

Angel in Danger is a 3D platform game with colorful environments unique characters and lots of action. It simply brings back the classic platform formula that was missing from today's mobile games.
Run and jump through 4 Worlds all packed with different and carefully designed levels. Find awesome power-ups to help you fight all of the enemies and bosses and bring peace to the Bright Kingdom.

Story:
It's always peaceful at the Bright Kingdom. But one day Lord Debol has found a way to get inside the Bright Kingdom. With his evil powers he captured the Angel Princess. A little boy was able to enter the evil portal and he is the only one who can save the Angel Princess.

Features:
- 4 Worlds with 24 challenging Levels
- Gorgeous 3D Graphics
- Easy to master controls and smooth gameplay
- Challenging boss fights
- 6 Characters to unlock
- Power-Ups and items to collect
- Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards
- Universal App with Full Retina and iPad Support
- Surprisingly Addictive Gameplay
